special_considerations: Confusion with the toxic False Morel (Gyromitra esculenta) is life-threatening
confusion_species_notes: The False Morel (Gyromitra esculenta) has a brain-like, wrinkled cap and contains the deadly toxin Gyromitrin. The cap of true morels is honeycomb-like pitted, not wrinkled!
handling_warnings: Do not consume raw under any circumstances
